name: D'Elia Design
tag_list: web-design, web-site-design, advertising, marketing, commercial-music--pbx-phone-systems, print-graphics, long-island, new-york, nassau-county
overview:
D’Elia Design LLC is a branding consultancy studio providing innovative solutions in branding, print collateral, packaging, and online media (web design, web sites).

They provide many services including the following: Web Site Design, Advertising Consumer, Advertising Trade, Branding and Logo Development, Collateral Materials, Commercial Music, Consumer Promotion, Event Planning, Free Standing Inserts, Graphic Design, Internet Advertising, Litigation Support Graphics, New Product Development, Out-of-Home Advertising, Package Design, PBX System Audio, Presentations, Retail Displays, Trade Show Graphics and Website Development.

More than just an agency, they believe in Green Design. They have taken many steps as an agency with responsible, green design including: On-site Recycling, Telecommuting, Car Pooling, Video Meetings, Follow Me PBX Phone Systems and Paperless Business Records.

They provide a free consultation and are with the client from design inception to final marketing collateral. This company does not outsource; all work is completed in the United States of America.
